verses.verse: עָלָ֥ה <S%H5927><s%> is come up מֵפִ֛יץ <S%H6327><s%> He that dasheth in pieces עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against פָּנַ֖יִךְ <S%H6440><s%> before thy face נָצ֣וֹר <S%H5341><s%> keep מְצֻרָ֑ה <S%H4694><s%> the munition צַפֵּה־ <S%H6822><s%> watch דֶ֙רֶךְ֙ <S%H1870><s%> the way חַזֵּ֣ק <S%H2388><s%> strong מָתְנַ֔יִם <S%H4975><s%> make [thy] loins אַמֵּ֥ץ <S%H553><s%> fortify כֹּ֖חַ <S%H3581><s%> [thy] power מְאֹֽד׃ <S%H3966><s%> mightily

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> though שָׁ֤ב <S%H7725><s%> hath turned away יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> For the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> גְּא֣וֹן <S%H1347><s%> the excellency יַעֲקֹ֔ב <S%H3290><s%> of Jacob כִּגְא֖וֹן <S%H1347><s%> as the excellency יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> though בְקָקוּם֙ <S%H1238><s%> for the emptiers בֹּֽקְקִ֔ים <S%H1238><s%> have emptied them out וּזְמֹרֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H2156><s%> their vine branches שִׁחֵֽתוּ׃ <S%H7843><s%> and marred

מָגֵ֨ן <S%H4043><s%> The shield גִּבֹּרֵ֜יהוּ <S%H1368><s%> of his mighty men מְאָדָּ֗ם <S%H119><s%> is made red אַנְשֵׁי־ <S%H376><s%> the warriors חַ֙יִל֙ <S%H2428><s%> the valiant מְתֻלָּעִ֔ים <S%H8529><s%> [are] in scarlet בְּאֵשׁ־ <S%H784><s%> [shall be] with flaming פְּלָד֥וֹת <S%H6393><s%> torches הָרֶ֖כֶב <S%H7393><s%> the chariots בְּי֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> in the day הֲכִינ֑וֹ <S%H3559><s%> of his preparation וְהַבְּרֹשִׁ֖ים <S%H1265><s%> and the fir trees הָרְעָֽלוּ׃ <S%H7477><s%> shall be terribly shaken

בַּֽחוּצוֹת֙ <S%H2351><s%> in the streets יִתְהוֹלְל֣וּ <S%H1984><s%> shall rage הָרֶ֔כֶב <S%H7393><s%> The chariots יִֽשְׁתַּקְשְׁק֖וּן <S%H8264><s%> they shall justle one against another בָּרְחֹב֑וֹת <S%H7339><s%> in the broad ways מַרְאֵיהֶן֙ <S%H4758><s%> they shall seem כַּלַּפִּידִ֔ם <S%H3940><s%> like torches כַּבְּרָקִ֖ים <S%H1300><s%> like the lightnings יְרוֹצֵֽצוּ׃ <S%H7323><s%> they shall run

יִזְכֹּר֙ <S%H2142><s%> He shall recount אַדִּירָ֔יו <S%H117><s%> his worthies יִכָּשְׁל֖וּ <S%H3782><s%> they shall stumble [בַהֲלִכֹותָם כ] (בַּהֲלִֽיכָתָ֑ם <S%H1979><s%> company ק) יְמַֽהֲרוּ֙ <S%H4116><s%> they shall make haste חֽוֹמָתָ֔הּ <S%H2346><s%> to the wall וְהֻכַ֖ן <S%H3559><s%> shall be prepared הַסֹּכֵֽךְ׃ <S%H5526><s%> thereof and the defence

שַׁעֲרֵ֥י <S%H8179><s%> The gates הַנְּהָר֖וֹת <S%H5104><s%> of the rivers נִפְתָּ֑חוּ <S%H6605><s%> shall be opened וְהַֽהֵיכָ֖ל <S%H1964><s%> and the palace נָמֽוֹג׃ <S%H4127><s%> shall be dissolved

וְהֻצַּ֖ב <S%H5324><s%> And Huzzab גֻּלְּתָ֣ה <S%H1540><s%> shall be led away captive הֹֽעֲלָ֑תָה <S%H5927><s%> she shall be brought up וְאַמְהֹתֶ֗יהָ <S%H519><s%> and her maids מְנַֽהֲגוֹת֙ <S%H5090><s%> shall lead כְּק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> [her] as with the voice יוֹנִ֔ים <S%H3123><s%> of doves מְתֹפְפֹ֖ת <S%H8608><s%> tabering עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on לִבְבֵהֶֽן׃ <S%H3824><s%> upon their breasts

וְנִינְוֵ֥ה <S%H5210><s%> But Nineveh כִבְרֵֽכַת־ <S%H1295><s%> like a pool מַ֖יִם <S%H4325><s%> of water מִ֣ימֵי <S%H3117><s%> [is] of old הִ֑יא <S%H1931><s%> he וְהֵ֣מָּה <S%H1992><s%> like נָסִ֔ים <S%H5127><s%> yet they shall flee away עִמְד֥וּ <S%H5975><s%> Stand עֲמֹ֖דוּ <S%H5975><s%> stand וְאֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> no מַפְנֶֽה׃ <S%H6437><s%> [shall they cry] but none shall look back

בֹּ֥זּוּ <S%H962><s%> Take ye the spoil כֶ֖סֶף <S%H3701><s%> of silver בֹּ֣זּוּ <S%H962><s%> take the spoil זָהָ֑ב <S%H2091><s%> of gold וְאֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> there קֵ֙צֶה֙ <S%H7097><s%> for [there is] none end לַתְּכוּנָ֔ה <S%H8498><s%> of the store כָּבֹ֕ד <S%H3519><s%> [and] glory מִכֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> every כְּלִ֥י <S%H3627><s%> furniture חֶמְדָּֽה׃ <S%H2532><s%> out of all the pleasant

בּוּקָ֥ה <S%H950><s%> She is empty וּמְבוּקָ֖ה <S%H4003><s%> and void וּמְבֻלָּקָ֑ה <S%H1110><s%> and waste וְלֵ֨ב <S%H3820><s%> and the heart נָמֵ֜ס <S%H4549><s%> melteth וּפִ֣ק <S%H6375><s%> smite together בִּרְכַּ֗יִם <S%H1290><s%> and the knees וְחַלְחָלָה֙ <S%H2479><s%> and much pain בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> the whole מָתְנַ֔יִם <S%H4975><s%> [is] in all loins וּפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> and the faces כֻלָּ֖ם <S%H3605><s%> and all קִבְּצ֥וּ <S%H6908><s%> of them all gather פָארֽוּר׃ <S%H6289><s%> blackness

אַיֵּה֙ <S%H346><s%> Where מְע֣וֹן <S%H4583><s%> Where [is] the dwelling אֲרָי֔וֹת <S%H738><s%> of the lions וּמִרְעֶ֥ה <S%H4829><s%> and the feedingplace ה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> he לַכְּפִרִ֑ים <S%H3715><s%> of the young lions אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> after הָלַךְ֩ <S%H1980><s%> walked אַרְיֵ֨ה <S%H738><s%> where the lion לָבִ֥יא <S%H3833><s%> [even] the old lion שָׁ֛ם <S%H8033><s%> in it גּ֥וּר <S%H1482><s%> whelp אַרְיֵ֖ה <S%H738><s%> [and] the lion's וְאֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> nothing מַחֲרִֽיד׃ <S%H2729><s%> and none made [them] afraid

אַרְיֵ֤ה <S%H738><s%> The lion טֹרֵף֙ <S%H2963><s%> did tear in pieces בְּדֵ֣י <S%H1767><s%> enough גֹֽרוֹתָ֔יו <S%H1484><s%> for his whelps וּמְחַנֵּ֖ק <S%H2614><s%> and strangled לְלִבְאֹתָ֑יו <S%H3833><s%> for his lionesses וַיְמַלֵּא־ <S%H4390><s%> and filled טֶ֣רֶף <S%H2964><s%> with prey חֹרָ֔יו <S%H2356><s%> his holes וּמְעֹֽנֹתָ֖יו <S%H4585><s%> and his dens טְרֵפָֽה׃ <S%H2966><s%> with ravin

הִנְנִ֣י <S%H2005><s%> behold אֵלַ֗יִךְ <S%H413><s%> I am against נְאֻם֙ <S%H5002><s%> Behold I [am] against thee saith יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD צְבָא֔וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts וְהִבְעַרְתִּ֤י <S%H1197><s%> and I will burn בֶֽעָשָׁן֙ <S%H6227><s%> in the smoke רִכְבָּ֔הּ <S%H7393><s%> her chariots וּכְפִירַ֖יִךְ <S%H3715><s%> thy young lions תֹּ֣אכַל <S%H398><s%> shall devour חָ֑רֶב <S%H2719><s%> and the sword וְהִכְרַתִּ֤י <S%H3772><s%> and I will cut off מֵאֶ֙רֶץ֙ <S%H776><s%> from the earth טַרְפֵּ֔ךְ <S%H2964><s%> thy prey וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> and no יִשָּׁמַ֥ע <S%H8085><s%> shall no more be heard ע֖וֹד <S%H5750><s%> longer ק֥וֹל <S%H6963><s%> and the voice מַלְאָכֵֽכֵה׃ <S%H4397><s%> of thy messengers ס
